titles.title: A bill for the relief of Frederick Paul and Aileen Paul.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on The Judiciary.
Referred to Subcommittee on Administrative Law and Governmental Relations.

bill.summary: 4/9/1987--Introduced. Relieves two named individuals of all Federal income tax liability arising from sums awarded to one of them in 1975 pursuant to the Alaska Native Claims Settlement Act for legal services rendered on behalf of certain Alaska Natives.
